EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_Neo4J Technology 7AM.Reminder 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Cancelled: Data-Driven Applications with Spring and Neo4j
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, We apologize for the inconvenience, however, due to unforeseen circumstances we are cancelling the Europe: 3:00pm BST (London, UTC+01:00) webinar Data-Driven Applications with Spring and Neo4j with Michael Hunger, Neo Technology and Josh Long, Pivotal. Feel free to join us for the 10:00am PST (San Francisco, UTC-07:00) webinar. Or watch the video recording within two weeks following the live session. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, May 20, 2014 North America: 10:00am PDT (San Francisco, UTC-07:00) Join the WebEx <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=661022264> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show all global call-in numbers <https://gopivotal.webex.com/cmp0401l/webcomponents/widget/globalcallin/globalcallin.do?siteurl=gopivotal&serviceType=EC&eventID=111195292&tollFree=1> Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 661 022 264 Thank you,
